title: Getting 'uninitialized constant ActionMailer (NameError)' in production when commented action_mailer railtie
body:
I've commented `# require "action_mailer/railtie"` in _application.rb_.  
When I run application in production environment I get _uninitialized constant ActionMailer (NameError)_ with the following error trace:  

```
$ rs -e production
=> Booting WEBrick
=> Rails 3.2.13 application starting in production on http://0.0.0.0:3000
=> Call with -d to detach
=> Ctrl-C to shutdown server
Exiting
/Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/activesupport-3.2.13/lib/active_support/inflector/methods.rb:230:in `block in constantize': uninitialized constant ActionMailer (NameError)
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/activesupport-3.2.13/lib/active_support/inflector/methods.rb:229:in `each'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/activesupport-3.2.13/lib/active_support/inflector/methods.rb:229:in `constantize'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/activesupport-3.2.13/lib/active_support/core_ext/string/inflections.rb:54:in `constantize'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/devise-3.1.0/app/mailers/devise/mailer.rb:1:in `<top (required)>'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/engine.rb:439:in `block (2 levels) in eager_load!'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/engine.rb:438:in `each'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/engine.rb:438:in `block in eager_load!'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/engine.rb:436:in `each'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/engine.rb:436:in `eager_load!'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/application/railties.rb:8:in `each'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/application/railties.rb:8:in `all'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/engine.rb:434:in `eager_load!'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/application/finisher.rb:53:in `block in <module:Finisher>'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/initializable.rb:30:in `instance_exec'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/initializable.rb:30:in `run'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/initializable.rb:55:in `block in run_initializers'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/initializable.rb:54:in `each'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/initializable.rb:54:in `run_initializers'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/application.rb:136:in `initialize!'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/railtie/configurable.rb:30:in `method_missing'
  from /Users/sergey/my-app-name/config/environment.rb:5:in `<top (required)>'
  from /Users/sergey/my-app-name/config.ru:3:in `block in <main>'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/rack-1.4.5/lib/rack/builder.rb:51:in `instance_eval'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/rack-1.4.5/lib/rack/builder.rb:51:in `initialize'
  from /Users/sergey/my-app-name/config.ru:in `new'
  from /Users/sergey/my-app-name/config.ru:in `<main>'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/rack-1.4.5/lib/rack/builder.rb:40:in `eval'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/rack-1.4.5/lib/rack/builder.rb:40:in `parse_file'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/rack-1.4.5/lib/rack/server.rb:200:in `app'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/commands/server.rb:46:in `app'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/rack-1.4.5/lib/rack/server.rb:304:in `wrapped_app'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/rack-1.4.5/lib/rack/server.rb:254:in `start'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/commands/server.rb:70:in `start'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/commands.rb:55:in `block in <top (required)>'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/commands.rb:50:in `tap'
  from /Users/sergey/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.3-p448@my-app-name/gems/railties-3.2.13/lib/rails/commands.rb:50:in `<top (required)>'
  from script/rails:6:in `require'
  from script/rails:6:in `<main>'
```

Probably it is common issue, however I didn't find any solution on this after googling.
